snippet: The purchase by Houghton Mifflin Harcourt of the culinary portfolio of John Wiley & Sons, as well as its reference books, means acquiring the all-American Betty Crocker cookbook series, among other assets.
abstract: The purchase by Houghton Mifflin Harcourt of the culinary portfolio of John Wiley & Sons, as well as its reference books, means acquiring the all-American Betty Crocker cookbook series, among other assets.

headline.main: In Deal With Wiley, Houghton Acquires Cookbooks and CliffsNotes
